title: Your name is ABATHA BALSEM. You bear TEAL BLOOD. After the very untimely death of your lusus at a young...

attachments.displayName: Your name is ABATHA BALSEM. You bear TEAL BLOOD. After the very untimely death of your lusus at a young and impressionable age, you became OBSESSED WITH THE NOTION OF DEATH, particularly the bizarre highblood practice of CORPSE PARTIES and CORPSE BOXES, both of which you find very lovely. You spend your time caring for various flora to DECORATE THE TOMBS OF THE DEAD, as well as planning out your and your friend’s inevitable arrangements. Upon meeting people you generally can name the type of BODY CONTAINER would suit them best, down to INTERIORS AND WOOD CHOICE. You have your own to sleep in, in an ELABORATE ROLEPLAY. You also are an ANTIQUE POSTMORTEM PHOTOGRAPHY enthusiast. You wield SCALPELKIND, as your duty as a MORTICIAN to highbloods dictates. However, you do not use it very often, as you know Death will come to you when it is ready for you. Your Trollhandle is perpetualMourner, and u_u < you speak in a peaceful and quiet manner and often close your eyes in a brief fantasy of death that causes you to serenely run into walls Unfortunately for you, you were caught in a storm and died of exposure in the woods, where you were left out to be eaten like a sensible troll.

object.content:
Your name is ABATHA BALSEM. You bear TEAL BLOOD. After the very untimely death of your lusus at a young and impressionable age, you became OBSESSED WITH THE NOTION OF DEATH, particularly the bizarre highblood practice of CORPSE PARTIES and CORPSE BOXES, both of which you find very lovely. You spend your time caring for various flora to DECORATE THE TOMBS OF THE DEAD, as well as planning out your and your friend’s inevitable arrangements. Upon meeting people you generally can name the type of BODY CONTAINER would suit them best, down to INTERIORS AND WOOD CHOICE. You have your own to sleep in, in an ELABORATE ROLEPLAY. You also are an ANTIQUE POSTMORTEM PHOTOGRAPHY enthusiast.

You wield SCALPELKIND, as your duty as a MORTICIAN to highbloods dictates. However, you do not use it very often, as you know Death will come to you when it is ready for you.

Your Trollhandle is perpetualMourner, and

u_u < you speak in a peaceful and quiet manner and often close your eyes in a brief fantasy of death that causes you to serenely run into walls

Unfortunately for you, you were caught in a storm and died of exposure in the woods, where you were left out to be eaten like a sensible troll.
